duties_responsibilities.duty: Envisioning and living into a comprehensive ministry with children, youth, and families, cradle to high school graduation.
Empowering others of all ages to discover their gifts and use them to further God’s love in the world.
Acting as a connector and empower-er of the congregation in ministry to and with children, youth, and families.
Owning the overreaching vision and empowering others.
Understanding the need for quality ministry to and with children, youth, and families of all ages.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Theology, Family Studies, or a related field (Master's preferred)
